mapper.select: select policyid, insure_name, insure_card, area, address, relation, holder_name, holder_card, holder_sex, holder_phone, holder_email, insure_date, first_auditor, second_auditor, third_auditor, insure_status, scout, scount_status, license, industry_code, acreage, firm_name, userid, premium, pol_property, del_status, paystatus, yuliu2 from insurance_slip
